title: Mythos
description:
This torrent contains the Marvel Comics Mythos series. These are a series of one-shot issues each devoted to a classic Marvel character or team, and that tell the central story for each of the Mythos characters.

Story and art are by Paul Jenkins and Paolo Rivera respectively. The art stands out on these and makes them more than just a hastily put together retelling of the origins of the central heroes in each book.

Thanks to the scanners and original sources.

Please seed. Please enjoy.
